title: Job Vacancies at FactBase Consulting Limited
content:
FactBase Consulting Limited - Our clients in various sectors are currently recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the following positions below:

1.) Chief Marketing Officer

Job Location: Delta

Job Opportunity


	Based on strategic business expansion, our client requires an honest, intelligent, diligent and experienced professional to grow with its team as a Chief Marketing Officer.


Key Areas of Responsibilities (Summary)
     

            
    




	Ensure performance, strategy, and alignment of the organisation revenue generating departments.
	Form a long-term perspective, manage an integrated team that drives business growth across all customer segments and profiles.
	Monitor the revenue pipeline and leads, adjusting as necessary for sustainable growth.
	Monitor the market and analyze opportunities, provide competitive strategies and tactics.


Major Requirements


	B.Sc. / HND / B.Tech any Social Sciences, Life Sciences or Physical Sciences (e.g., Chemical Engineering, Petroleum Engineering, Geophysics, Polymer Engineering, etc) or other relevant discipline.
	MBA or any other higher degree may be an added advantage.
	Minimum of eight years’ experience with at least three years’ in a similar role.
	Experience working in the Oil and Gas industry is a must.
	Strong proficiency in MS Office Suite.


Reward System


	Salary is highly competitive and negotiable.
	There is high prospect for career advancement based on job performance.


Application Closing Date: 30th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: factbaseconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the e-mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted, please.

 

 

2.) Deposit Mobilisation Officer

Job Location: Alaba, Ojota & Ajegunle - Lagos

Job Summary


	Our client requires the services of result-oriented, diligent and honest individuals to join its growing team in some locations
	In this role, you will innovate and improve ways of rewarding depositors in terms of interest earning on ordinary deposit, and fixed deposits.


Requirements


	B.Sc./HND in Business Administration, Banking and Finance, Economics, Accounting or any other numerate discipline.
	Minimum of one year of relevant experience in an MFB or MFI.
	Strong proficiency in MS Office Suite.


Salary
N190,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 23rd July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: factbaseconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position and preferred Location as the subject of the e-mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted, please.

 

3.) Branch Manager

Job Location: Alaba, Lagos

Job Summary


	Oversee daily operations of the branch, ensuring smooth and efficient service delivery to clients.


Qualifications


	Candidates should possess a B.Sc / B.Tech / HND in any numerate disciplines.
	Minimum of four years of experience in a similar or managerial role, preferably in an MFB/MFI or commercial bank
	ACA/MCIB/ACIB or a higher degree may be a plus.
	Strong proficiency in MS Office Suite.


Salary
N600,000 / Month.

Application Closing Date: 23rd July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: factbaseconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position and preferred Location as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted, please.

 

 

4.) Sales Manager

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo

Job Summary


	We are seeking an honest, brilliant and diligent individual to join its team as Sales Manager.


Job Description


	Research market trends and analyze competitors’ performance to develop effective sales strategies for your team.
	Implement new sales strategies and techniques and provide training on them to other agents.
	Complete independent market research and list new prospects.
	Manage team performance, set team targets and goals.


Requirements


	B.Sc./HND in Marketing, Business Administration, Economics, Finance or any other related discipline.
	A higher degree may be an advantage.
	Minimum of three years' FMCG experience in a similar role.
	Age: Minimum of 35 years.
	Strong proficiency in MS Office Suite.


Remuneration


	Salary is N350,000 per month.
	There is prospect for career advancement.


Application Closing Date: 22nd July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: factbaseconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the e-mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted, please.

Market Executive (Real Estate) Job at Nik De Panache Limited




        
    

        
        Nik De Panache Limited is a real estate, life style, Investment and Construction Company incorporated in the year 2015. Nik De Panache was birthed out of passion to achieve excellence and deliver quality services to our clients in a panache manner. The name Nik De Panache is a combination of two words, Nik and Panache. Nik: is a suffix denoting a person associated with a specified quality Panache: flamboyant display of confidence and style.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Market Executive (Real Estate)
Job Location: Wuye, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Market Executive will be responsible for promoting the company’s real estate products and services, identifying potential clients, and driving sales through effective marketing strategies.
	The role involves field marketing, client engagement, property presentations, and achieving sales targets to support the company’s growth objectives.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and engage prospective clients for company properties and services.
	Conduct market research to identify emerging trends, competitors, and potential opportunities within the real estate market.
	Implement marketing and sales strategies to promote property listings and drive sales.
	Provide detailed information to clients about properties, including prices, features, and payment options.
	Plan and execute marketing campaigns, open houses, and promotional activities to enhance brand visibility.
	Develop and maintain relationships with clients, property agents, and other key stakeholders.
	Organize and conduct property inspections, tours, and site visits for clients.
	Maintain up-to-date knowledge of market conditions, property laws, and real estate documentation processes.
	Represent the company at networking events, exhibitions, and meetings as required.


Requirements


	Minimum of HND / B.Sc Degree in Marketing, Estate Management, Business Administration, or related field.
	3-5 years of proven experience in real estate marketing or sales and construction industries.
	Strong knowledge of the local real estate market, customer needs, and industry trends.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, interpersonal skills, proactive, and willing to work on the field as required.
	Solution-oriented with ability to build relationships with clients, meet and exceed sales targets with minimal supervision.
	Good organizational, presentation, and time management skills.


Method of Application:
Interested and qualified applicants should send their Resume and Cover Letter to: nikdepanache.recruitment@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Operation Assistant Job at BAFashion Shop




        
    

        
        BAFashion is a fast-growing fashion and lifestyle brand focused on offering trendy, budget-friendly, and quality clothing for the modern customer. Our aim is to create a smooth shopping experience through innovation, consistency, and excellent customer service.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operation Assistant
Job Location: Ketu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Working Hours: Monday to Saturday, 8:00 AM – 6:00 PM

Position Summary
     

            
    




	As an Operations Assistant, you will provide hands-on support across our factory operations, working closely with the Vendor Manager to supervise tailors, monitor vendor activities, and ensure smooth workflow from production to delivery.
	This role is ideal for proactive, organized individuals with strong coordination and communication skills.


Key Responsibilities


	Support the Vendor Manager in coordinating daily factory operations and supervising tailors.
	Monitor, track, and report on vendor and tailor performance.
	Supervise and optimize vendor activities to ensure on-time delivery and quality compliance.
	Collaborate with procurement, quality control, and logistics teams for seamless operations.
	Identify and resolve process bottlenecks across the supply chain.
	Maintain accurate documentation of supply movements and vendor interactions.


Requirements


	First Degree in any relevant field.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in operations,or vendor coordination.
	Experience in fashion, manufacturing, or similar industries is an advantage.
	Excellent organization and multitasking skills.
	Ability to work both day and night shifts as required.
	Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
	Proximity to the Ketu axis is mandatory.


Compensation


	Net salary: N150,000 – N170,000 / Month.
	Exposure to full-scale fashion production processes.
	Career growth opportunities within a growing fashion brand.
	Collaborative and professional work environment.



Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
